response.overview: Lloyd is the most paranoid guy you could ever meet. Convinced that his mother is "some woman" playing the part and that his psychiatrist is working for "them," he only trusts his friend Traci. But when she insists that he go outside to celebrate his birthday, he's not sure whether he can really trust her either.
response.tagline: One room full of questions. One room full of secrets.
response.title: The Basement and the Kitchen
